title: Sales Closer for SaaS Partnership Offer
description:
Closer for SaaS Partnership Offer



We are looking for a reliable and professional part-time inbound sales caller / closer to help us speak with warm prospects and close simple partnership calls.



About the offer



We work with 2 SaaS products that are offered to creators, educators, and online business owners as partnership opportunities.



The model is simple:



creators can recommend the SaaS to their audience or clients



they earn recurring revenue share



we help them monetize without building software themselves



Your job is not hard selling.

The offer is simple, interesting, and easy to explain.



We already have 2 outreachers booking calls, so you will mainly be handling scheduled calls and helping interested prospects understand the opportunity.



What you will do



Attend scheduled sales / partnership calls



Explain the opportunity clearly and confidently



Answer simple questions from prospects



Help move interested prospects toward becoming partners



Follow a clear call structure / script



Send follow-up messages after calls if needed



Keep basic notes on each call



Compensation



$100/month fixed



Based on 5 hours per week of availability



Equivalent to $5/hour



Plus $50 for each closed call



This means you have both:



a small fixed monthly payment



performance upside for each successful close



Who this is for



This role is a good fit if you are:



comfortable speaking English on calls



confident talking to online business owners / creators



good at explaining offers in a simple way



organized and reliable



available weekly for calls



interested in sales, partnerships, SaaS, or online business



Ideal candidate



We would love someone who has experience in one or more of these:



sales calls



appointment closing



affiliate / partnership offers



SaaS sales



online coaching / digital product space



outreach follow-up



You do not need to be super technical.



We will provide:



context on the offer



support materials



demo videos



a clear explanation of the products



guidance on how to handle the calls



Important



This role is designed to be simple and low-stress.



You will not need to find leads yourself.

You will not need to do cold outreach.

You will mainly be speaking with booked prospects and helping close aligned opportunities.



To apply send en
 to 
 or via message



Please send:



A short intro about yourself



Your experience with sales calls / closing / client calls



Your English level



A voice note or short audio introduction



Your availability per week



Any past experience in SaaS, affiliate offers, partnerships, or online business



Bonus if you can also share:



a sample sales call recording



a Loom/video intro



previous closing results



We are looking for someone reliable, easy to work with, and good on calls.

title: Real Estate Property Manager
description:
Property Management Company seeking an experienced Property Manager to act as our team lead. We are looking for someone who is able to problem solve on their own, fix issues quickly without being asked, communicate effectively, and drive collections. Ideally, the candidate should have TurboTenant experience.



Responsibilities: 

- Oversee the daily operations of multiple properties, of residential units  

- Experience working with a virtual assistant staff that works remote. 

- Manage tenant relations, including addressing inquiries, concerns, and complaints in a timely and professional manner 

- Conduct property inspections to ensure compliance with safety and maintenance standards - Send / serve 7 day notices 

- Ensure compliance with fair housing regulations and other applicable laws  

- S8 experience necessary 

- Negotiate lease agreements and renewals with tenants 

- Handle rent collection and financial reporting

 - Maintain accurate records of all property-related activities  

- Maintain an average of 96%+ of rent collected  



Experience: 

- Minimum of 5 years of experience in property management, preferably in a senior role 

- Strong knowledge of property maintenance practices and procedures - Excellent phone etiquette and customer relationship management skills 

- Experience in facilities management, including overseeing maintenance staff and contractors

 - Familiarity with fair housing regulations and other relevant laws 

- Proficiency in property management software such as Yardi or similar platforms

 - Experience working with Section 8 housing programs is a plus 

- Strong data entry skills and attention to detail 

- Ability to effectively manage conflicts and resolve issues  

- Experience with TurboTenant is a plus

title: Revit/BIM Designer
Creative Content Assistant
description:
Salary & Hours:



Rate: $5.00 USD per hour.



Schedule: Part-time to start (approx. 20 hours/week) with the possibility of moving to full-time hours based on performance and business needs.



Payment: Paid weekly via Payoneer or Wise.



Salty Swabbers Housekeeping is a cleaning and property rental management company based in Nova Scotia, Canada. We are looking for a creative "maker" to join our team and help us amp up our online presence.



We already have an Online Presence Manager who handles our technical SEO, website, and posting strategy. Your job is to be the "Production Studio"—you create the high-quality assets (Reels, TikToks, Graphics), and he puts them to work.



Your Responsibilities:



Social Media Content: Create engaging, trendy Reels, TikToks, and posts for Instagram,
, and TikTok.



Strategic Ideation: Proactively communicate with the owner to brainstorm new content ideas, write scripts for videos, and develop creative concepts.



Media Management: You will start by working through a large back-catalogue of existing raw footage and photos to create fresh, high-performing content.



Print Marketing: Design professional physical materials including brochures, business cards, and posters for our local service area.



Brand Consistency: Ensure all materials match the Salty Swabbers brand "vibe."



Collaboration: Work directly with our Online Presence Manager to deliver assets on schedule.



Requirements:



Strong Background in Business Marketing: You understand how to create content that actually converts viewers into customers.



Proven Graphic Design Experience: Proficiency in Canva, Photoshop, or Illustrator for both digital and print.



Video Editing Specialist: Expert-level skills in CapCut, Premiere Pro, or similar, with a focus on short-form vertical video.



Communication: Must be highly responsive via Text/Messaging apps only.



Industry Preference: Preference will be given to candidates who have previous experience creating content specifically for cleaning companies or property management/real estate brands.



Note: This position does not require any phone calls or voice support. All communication is via text/email.



How to Apply:

Please send your resume, portfolio or links to your best work (specifically short-form video and print designs). In your application, please confirm you are comfortable working primarily via
/text.

title: SCHEDULER P6 Mixed Use US Project
description:
P6 CONSTRUCTION PROJECT SCHEDULE FOR HIGH RISE MIXED USE MULTIFAMILY PROJECT IN UNITED STATES



Work hours are United States New York City Time, Eastern Time.



Applicant must have Demonstrated, Verifiable Experience working on United States High Rise Mixed Use Projects.



Role and Responsibilities:

• Proficient with Primavera P6 scheduling software.

• Proficient with MS Project software.

• Assist project team to prepare develop the schedule for large, multi-phase hi-rise construction project.

• Perform all aspects of schedule updates with the project team.

• Analyze and evaluate schedule updates and explain impacts to the project team.

• Cost and resource load the schedule.

• Track change conditions and impacts to the schedule.

• Identify and articulate schedule concerns and delays to the project tea
mbers.

• Conduct Critical Path Method (CPM) analysis and scenario planning for executive decision-making.

• Responsible for independently creating, updating and monitoring Project schedules in P6.

• Direct, demonstrated portfolio experience estimating large, multi-component mixed use construction projects.

• Additional duties as directed by the Company.



Position Requirements:

• Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Construction Management, Architecture, Project Management, or related field.

• Minimum 5 years of scheduling experience in complex technology projects.

• Expert level skills in Primavera P6, Microsoft Project software and working knowledge of schedule integration and cost/resource loading (Knowledge of TILOS & Primavera Risk analysis a plus).

• Advanced/Expert skills in Microsoft Excel.

• Strong understanding of Critical Path Method (CPM), project controls, and construction sequencing.

• Self-starting; proactive, able to work independently with little oversight or guidance.

• Able to plan and manage project schedules requiring over 1,500 activities.

• Excellent Interpersonal skills with good verbal and written communication skills, with detail oriented and rigorous attention to detail mindset.



Required Skills /Training Requirements:

• Experience supporting construction project management functions, including estimating, cost control, and coordination across multiple trades and work packages.

• Experience managing schedules with over 1,500 activities and applying U.S. construction sequencing standards for high-rise and mixed-use developments.

• Experience creating Level 4-6 Baseline Schedules in Primavera P6 with logical sequencing across multiple trades and phases.

• Strong background in cost/resource loading, change tracking, and risk identification using tools like Oracle Aconex, Power BI, and RAID logs.

•Ability to create Power BI dashboards.

• 5 years of direct construction scheduling experience, preferably in large high rise apartment and mixed use development projects.



• **MUST Have: P6 Software experience**



**As part of the interview process applicant will be asked to conduct and lead a live, walk-through demonstration of a mixed-use complex development schedule to demonstrate applicant's aptitude and knowledge of scheduling and working on a mixed-use project in the United States**



**The position is a Full Time position with the Company and applicant should not intend to hold other employment for other employers while working for the Company**

title: Children Book Illustrator and Graphic Designer
description:
Children's Book Illustrator & Graphic Designer



"Must Provide Resume and Portfolio"



About the Role

We are seeking a talented and imaginative Children's Book Illustrator & Graphic Designer to join our creative team. In this dynamic role, you will bring stories to life through compelling illustrations and design a wide range of visual materials — from whimsical children's books to eye-catching brochures and create digital ads (web design is a plus). If you have a passion for storytelling through visuals and a strong command of industry-leading design tools, we want to hear from you!



Key Responsibilities

Create original illustrations for children's books, including character design, scene composition, and cover art

Design professional brochures, flyers, and print marketing materials for various clients and campaigns

Develop compelling digital and print advertisements that align with brand guidelines

Collaborate with authors, editors, and marketing teams to translate ideas into engaging visual narratives

Produce layouts for multi-page publications, ensuring design consistency and visual flow

Create social media graphics, banners, and digital content optimized for various platforms

Revise and iterate on designs based on feedback from stakeholders and clients

Maintain organized project files and adhere to production deadlines

Contribute to brainstorming sessions and present creative concepts to the team



Required Qualifications

Minimum 3 years of professional experience in illustration and/or graphic design

Proven portfolio showcasing children's book illustration, character design, and graphic design work

Must know how to use AI applications

Strong understanding of typography, color theory, and visual hierarchy

Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously

Excellent communication skills and receptiveness to creative feedback



Required Software & Technical Skills

Adobe Photoshop (Advanced)

Adobe Illustrator (Advanced)

Adobe InDesign

Adobe Firefly (AI-Assisted Design)

Adobe Acrobat

Canva

Procreate or equivalent digital drawing app

Microsoft Office / Google Workspace

Project management tools (Trello, Asana, etc.)

Cloud file management (Google Drive, Dropbox)



Preferred Qualifications

Experience with AI-assisted design workflows and generative art tools

Background in children's educational content or publishing industry

Knowledge of print production processes and file preparation for press

Experience with motion graphics or basic animation

Familiarity with brand identity development





You will be given a small test assignment to show your skills

Responsible and organized

title: Millwork Drafts Person + Project Coordinator
description:
High end residential millwork / cabinet maker is seeking a highly organized shop drafts person with the communicative skills for client facing project coordination.



Starting compensation is $5 per hour.  We do increase our staffs pay as they learn our processes and show their value and commitment to our company.  (We provide pay increase).  Most of our current remote staff has worked with us for 3-8 years.



Must haves:

- 3+ years MINIMUM related working experience in high-end millwork / cabinetry / interior fit outs

- Ability to produce your own shop drawings (CAD + other drafting software)

- Must be able to work SOME overlapping hours with New York Time

- meticulously organized and diligent in the details

- highly punctual and consistent in your output and communications

- Awesome, clear, and fun communicator

- Dedicated work space and ability to have video calls in an environment that is not distracting

- Reliable Internet an





To Apply MUST Provide ALL of the following via ONE shared link.

1. One shared link to ALL of the requested documents

2. Portfolio of highly detailed / technical shop drawings

3. Portfolio of other drafting and/or rendering work a plus!  This can be floor plans, exterior elevations, models, renders, etc.

4. Your resume (must see where you worked / how long you worked there)

5. A brief 1-3 minute video introduction.  Please do not use scripted or buzz words.  In the video I want to know who you are both personally and professionally.  I should feel like I got to know you over a cup of coffee.  In this video I also want you to tell me what you liked or disliked about past project, explain how you do something (such as prepare a shop drawing, field measure a space, handle client communications, etc.) I want these explanations in plain language. Bonus if you explain duration of a recent project and explain what went right, want went wrong, anything you would have changed if you did it over again..

title: Part-Time Creative VA for E-commerce Ad Research & Design
description:
Part-Time Creative VA for E-commerce Ad Research & Design



We’re an expanding international e-commerce group operating several online brands across the US and Europe. We’re currently looking for a dependable, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant who has experience in the dropshipping space and a strong eye for ad creatives.



This role focuses on identifying winning ad concepts and turning them into clean, effective static creatives for Meta platforms. If you enjoy researching trends, working with visuals, and contributing to performance-driven marketing, this could be a great fit.





Key Responsibilities

Create and edit static ad creatives (layout tweaks, text swaps, translations, etc.)

Develop simple ad concepts or templates when needed

Ensure all deliverables are completed accurately and on schedule





What We’re Looking For

Reliable, proactive, and creative mindset

Strong attention to visual details and brand consistency

Hands-on experience with Canva, Photoshop, or similar tools

Background working with dropshipping or e-commerce brands

Availability to work weekends when required





Schedule & Compensation

$7 per hour

/Instagram) before? Tell us a bit about your experience.

title: Adobe Premiere Podcast Editor
description:
Podcast Editing - Key Concepts Podcast. I am looking for someone to edit in Adobe Premiere so that we can work off the same files. I have 3 cameras + audio files. 



1) Sync the content

2) Color correct the content

3) Cut between camera angels (remove umh, ahs, rambling)

4) Create highlight reels

5) Send me the content. 

6) I will do the final review, lower thirds, and content publishing..



Look up "Key Concepts Podcast" on YouTube to see what the final product looks like. 



* Looking to hire a few people to see who can understand and edit the content the best and then stick to that 1 person only. 



I anticipate creating 6-8 podcasts a month as I grow, currently only doing 3-4. So, we will work together to get more content and work scheduled. Currently, I spend about 8 hours editing 1 episode. That includes the 1 full podcast, 1 highlight video, 25 reels. I anticipate that it will take someone a little longer until they learn my workflow style and get faster at editing. 



I will create a video recording that goes over my entire editing process so you can copy my style. 



Notably, I work full time myself, so sometimes it takes a few hours to respond, and sometimes there may be slower periods compared to others. My goal is to eventually make enough money from Podcasting that I can quit my regular job and do it full time. So, looking for someone to really partner with me on my journey. 



***** Although we are not doing anything difficult in Adobe Premiere, you must be proficient in it to understand how to use the software.



This job is only for editing the rough draft. I will edit the final draft when I receive the files back from you. 



Thank you.

title: Administrative Assistant
description:
About Us

AFC is a growing construction company specializing in water damage restoration and hardwood

floor refinishing. We are looking for a highly organized and proactive Administrative Assistant to

help support daily operations and keep our workflow running smoothly.



Position Overview

We are seeking a detail-oriented and reliable assistant who can handle inbound and outbound

calls, manage our CRM system, follow up with clients, and support overall administrative

operations. This role is essential in helping us stay organized, responsive, and efficient.



Key Responsibilities

Customer Communication

? Handle inbound and outbound calls professionally

? Respond to customer inquiries regarding water damage and flooring services

? Schedule estimates, site visits, and follow-ups

? Follow up with leads and past clients



CRM & Administrative Support

? Update and maintain CRM accurately

? Maintain organized digital files and documentation

? Ensure all customer information is complete and up to date

? Help improve internal systems and processes



Qualifications

? Highly organized and detail-oriented

? Excellent English communication skills (spoken and written)

? Comfortable handling outbound and inbound calls

? Experience using CRM systems

? Experience in construction, restoration, or service-based industries is a plus

? Ability to multitask and prioritize effectively

? Reliable internet connection



What We’re Looking For

We need someone who:

? Takes initiative

? Follows through on tasks

? Keeps systems organized

? Communicates clearly and professionally

? Helps us stay on top of leads, clients, and operations



How to Apply

Please send your resume along with:

1. A short introduction about yourself

2. Your previous experience with CRM systems

3. Your availability (including time zone)

4. Your expected hourly rate

5. Short 30 to 1 min recording

title: Sales & Marketing Specialist
description:
Sales & Marketing Specialist

The engine behind our pipeline — you make sure no lead goes cold.

 

About the Role

We're not looking for someone who just schedules posts and calls it a day. As our Sales & Marketing Specialist, you'll be the operational backbone of our sales engine — building pipelines, maintaining the systems that keep deals moving, and running smart B2B lead generation campaigns that actually convert. Think of this as a Field Sales Manager role in spirit, but with a heavy emphasis on the tools, data, and campaigns that fuel our growth. If you love digging through Apollo, hunting leads on LinkedIn, and building CRM workflows that actually work — this one's for you.



What You'll Be Doing



CRM & Pipeline Management

•        Own and maintain our CRM — keep it clean, up-to-date, and useful (no ghost contacts, no cluttered pipelines)

•        Build and optimize workflows, sequences, and automations that support the sales team's daily operations

•        Track lead activity, deal stages, and campaign performance to surface actionable insights



B2B Lead Generation

•        Design and execute outbound lead generation campaigns targeting procurement managers, business owners, and purchasing teams

•        Use tools like 
, ZoomInfo, and similar platforms to mine and qualify high-potential leads

•        Build targeted contact lists based on industry, company size, geography, and buying signals



LinkedIn & Digital Outreach

•        Run LinkedIn lead generation campaigns — from connection strategies to InMail sequences and content-driven inbound attraction

•        Collaborate with the marketing team to align messaging across
, LinkedIn, and other outreach channels

•        A/B test subject lines, messaging angles, and CTAs to continuously improve response rates



Sales Support

•        Provide sales collateral, pitch decks, and campaign assets to support Account Executives in closing deals

•        Research target accounts and compile company intelligence ahead of sales calls

•        Coordinate between the sales and marketing teams to ensure campaigns are timed and targeted effectively



You're a Great Fit If You...

•        Have hands-on experience with CRM platforms (HubSpot, Salesforce, or similar) and know your way around automations

•        Are comfortable using lead intel tools like Apollo, ZoomInfo, Lusha, or Hunter

•        Have run LinkedIn outreach campaigns and understand what makes a message actually get a reply

•        Are detail-oriented — you catch the typos, the data gaps, and the sequences that are one step off

•        Can think like a marketer AND a salesperson — you understand the full funnel

•        Thrive in a fast-paced, target-driven environment where you're expected to figure things out



Nice to Have

•        Experience in B2B wholesale, trading, procurement, or import/export industries

•        Familiarity with
 marketing tools (Mailchimp, Lemlist, Instantly, etc.)

•        Basic graphic design skills for creating simple marketing assets

•        Experience working with global or cross-cultural clients



What We Offer

•        A role with real ownership — not just task execution

•        Competitive base salary

•        A collaborative team that moves fast and values results over politics

•        The opportunity to build something from the ground up with a growing global sourcing company

title: Account Executive
description:
Account Executive

You close. You build. You own your book of business — and you're proud of it.

 

About the Role

This isn't a role for someone who waits for leads to land in their lap. As an Account Executive at 
, you're the tip of the spear — you prospect, you pitch, you negotiate, and you close. You'll be handling high-stakes conversations with procurement teams and business owners who need reliable global sourcing partners, and you'll be the person who turns those conversations into signed contracts. Once a deal is done, you don't hand it off and move on — you're the quarterback of the client relationship, connecting them to our product sourcing and logistics teams to make sure delivery on what you promised.



This role comes with a competitive base pay plus commissions on every deal you close. The upside is real — and so is the accountability.



What You'll Be Doing



Business Development & Prospecting

•        Build your own pipeline — you don't wait for marketing to feed you leads (though they'll help)

•        Identify, qualify, and pursue new business opportunities across industries that rely on bulk product sourcing

•        Partner with the Sales & Marketing Manager and Marketing team on targeted lead generation campaigns — but you know how to hunt independently too

•        Attend industry events, networking opportunities, and trade shows as needed



High-Level Negotiation & Deal Closing

•        Lead pricing negotiations for bulk orders, long-term contracts, and recurring procurement deals

•        Develop and present tailored sourcing proposals and pricing strategies that work for both the client and the company.

•        Own the process from first contact through to contract signature — you're not handing this off mid-way

•        Navigate complex procurement cycles with multiple stakeholders without losing 
ntum



Client Relationship Management

•        Serve as the primary point of contact for your clients from contract signing onward

•        Act as the liaison between clients and our product sourcing and logistics teams — you translate client needs into actionable briefs and make sure execution doesn't drop the ball

•        Proactively manage expectations, flag delays or issues before they become problems, and always show up with solutions

•        Build long-term relationships that drive repeat business, upsells, and referrals



Quota & Performance

•        Hit monthly and quarterly revenue quotas — this is non-negotiable

•        Maintain an accurate and updated pipeline in the CRM at all times

•        Provide regular forecasting and deal updates to the Sales & Marketing Manager



You're a Great Fit If You...

•        Have 3+ years of B2B sales experience — ideally in trading, wholesale, procurement, logistics, or a related field

•        Know how to negotiate without burning bridges — you're firm, fair, and smart about it

•        Are self-driven and take full accountability for your pipeline and results

•        Can confidently engage C-suite and senior procurement stakeholders

•        Are comfortable with ambiguity — you figure things out, you don't wait to be told

•        Have strong communication and follow-through — clients trust you because you do what you say

•        Know your way around a CRM and keep your pipeline accurate



Nice to Have

•        Experience in global sourcing, China procurement, or import/export sales

•        Existing network in industries such as retail, manufacturing, FMCG, construction, or e-commerce

•        Familiarity with freight, logistics, and supply chain basics

•        Experience closing deals in the $50K–$500K+ range



What We Offer

•        Competitive base salary — we respect your time and experience

•        Commission on every deal you close — no cap, no politics, just results

•        A real product to sell: end-to-end global sourcing that genuinely helps businesses cut costs and source smarter

•        A lean, fast-moving team where your wins are visible and celebrated

•        Room to grow — as we scale, the people who built the business will be first in line for bigger opportunities

title: Experienced Patient Billing, Statements & Eligibility Specialist (Healthcare – Voice Required)
description:
Location: Remote (Philippines)

Work Type: Full-Time

Industry: U.S. Healthcare

About the Role



We are a growing U.S.-based healthcare organization seeking an Experienced Patient Billing, Statements & Eligibility Specialist whose primary responsibility is handling patient billing statements, eligibility discussions, and billing-related concerns.



This is a high-communication, voice-focused position.



You will speak directly with patients regarding:

Billing statements

Insurance eligibility

Copays, deductibles, coinsurance

Coverage verification

Payment responsibilities

If you are confident on the phone, calm under pressure, and experienced explaining insurance and billing clearly to patients — this role is for you.



Primary Responsibilities

Generate and review patient billing statements

Verify and understand insurance eligibility and benefits

Explain deductibles, copays, coinsurance, and coverage limits

Call patients regarding balances and payment arrangements

Answer inbound billing and eligibility questions

Address patient concerns related to insurance processing

Document all conversations accurately

Coordinate with internal billing team when clarification is needed

Escalate complex or sensitive cases appropriately





REQUIRED EXPERIENCE

Applicants must have:

U.S. medical billing experience

Insurance eligibility verification experience

Experience explaining insurance benefits to patients



Strong understanding of:

Deductibles

Out-of-pocket maximums

Copays

Coinsurance

EOBs



If you do not have eligibility experience, please do not apply.



Communication Requirements

This is a voice-heavy position. The majority of your role will involve speaking with patients.



You must have:



Excellent spoken English!!!!!  

Clear and professional tone

Confident phone presence

Ability to handle emotional or frustrated patients calmly

Strong active listening skills

Ability to explain complex insurance matters in simple terms





REQUIRED: Voice Recording Submission (Mandatory)



We will NOT review or interview any applicant who does not submit a voice recording.



Please submit a 1–2 minute voice recording answering:



Introduce yourself.

Describe your experience with U.S. medical billing and eligibility.

Explain how you would speak to a patient who is confused about their deductible and balance.

Applications without a voice recording will be automatically declined.



This Role Is NOT for You If:

You prefer non-voice work

You are uncomfortable discussing money

You struggle explaining insurance clearly

You avoid difficult conversations

You lack confidence speaking with patients

Ideal Candidate Traits

Calm and professional under pressure

Empathetic but firm

High emotional intelligence

Organized and detail-oriented

Strong accountability

Solutions-focused mindset

Compensation

Competitive pay based on experience.

Performance-based incentives available for:

Patient satisfaction

Accuracy

Efficiency

Resolution rate



We are building a professional, high-level billing team. If you are experienced in both billing and eligibility and take pride in excellent patient communication, we encourage you to apply.

title: Head of Creative Strategy – E-commerce
description:
We’re a fast-growing e-commerce company launching multiple brands in the footwear and supplements space. Our execution team is already in place — video editors, designers, and landing page builders ready to produce.



Now we’re looking for a Creative Strategist to lead the thinking behind the work.



Your Mission

Own the creative process end-to-end — from market research and angle development to scripting, concept creation, and briefing the production team to execute high-converting assets.



--



Key Responsibilities



Creative Direction – Provide clear, actionable briefs for editors and designers, grounded in real production experience.

Concept Development – Turn research into strong hooks, angles, and structured ad concepts.

Market Research – Analyze competitors, Ad Libraries, and TikTok trends to uncover scalable ideas.

Funnel Thinking – Ensure ads and landing pages work together as one cohesive conversion flow.

Performance Optimization – Use metrics like hook rate and CTR to refine creatives and improve results.



--



Requirements



Background as a video editor, designer, or hands-on creative

Experience working with scaling DTC/e-commerce brands

Portfolio showing creatives you strategized or produced

Strong performance mindset — you focus on what converts, not just aesthetics



--



To Apply

Include “HOOK-STRATEGIST” in your subject line and answer the following:



1. List the top 3 DTC brands you’ve worked with and link a creative or funnel you influenced. What was your role?

2. On a scale of 1–10, how strong are your design/editing skills? Can you jump into files to fix issues if needed?

3. Share a link to your portfolio.

4. If hook rate is strong but viewers drop after a few seconds, what’s likely wrong and how would you brief the editor to fix it?

5. If launching an orthopedic sneaker for seniors, how would you research your first three testing angles?

title: Video Editor who #Believes in Entrepreneurs| Flexible Work Schedule
description:
We're trying to solve the world's biggest problem: People don't #Believe in themselves enough. For over 22 years, Evan Carmichael has been dedicated to this mission. The way we're approaching this problem is producing inspirational content at scale. The right video at the right time can completely change someone's life and we want to touch as many lives as possible. People may not have a supportive family or community around them, but our content can help give them the belief they need to chase their dreams and make the world a better place. We want to work with people who also want to make an impact and touch people's lives. In your application, please put ‘I am your next awesome Video Editor!’ in the subject line. Please apply through OnlineJobsPh and not via
. The job responsibilities include editing the first minute of videos to grab and keep the audience's attention, selecting the most engaging clips, adding eye-catching transitions and effects, ensuring the sound and visuals are top-notch, and staying on top of the latest trends to keep things fresh. Our goal is to get to 70% audience retention in the first minute. Additionally, strong creativity, attention to detail, and effective communication skills are essential to produce high-quality videos that engage viewers and meet retention goals. Please also share the link to your resume and portfolio, what your hourly salary expectations are, and in the first line of your message tell us how many YouTube subscribers Evan Carmichael has, followed by who your favorite entrepreneur of all time is and why. The job is full time (40 hours per week) with a flexible schedule. We would start off with a small project for now and we'd pay you for your ideas and research. We also like to work with people over a long period of time, not just short contracts, and give them opportunities to succeed and do more based on what they want to learn. Hopefully that will be you! Thank you for reading and good luck! Sending lots of love! -Irish #Believe

title: Senior Bookkeeper *Superstar Only*
description:
We are looking for two experienced bookkeepers to join our finance team and take ownership of expense categorization, transaction reconciliation, accounts payable, and invoice processing across multiple legal entities.



The bookkeepers will work closely with the CFO, ensuring that all financial transactions are accurately recorded, categorized, and reconciled on a regular basis. This role is ideal for someone who is detail-oriented, organized, and comfortable managing financial data across multiple platforms — including Xero, Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and our custom CRM.



Key Responsibilities

- Categorize all expenses and transactions in Xero, ensuring accurate classification for reporting and compliance

- Reconcile transactions across multiple payment platforms, including Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRM tools

- Manage accounts payable, ensuring all invoices are properly reviewed, recorded, and scheduled for payment

- Assist with invoice processing, ensuring all vendor invoices are accurately documented and match purchase orders where applicable

- Work closely with the CFO to provide up-to-date financial records for monthly, quarterly, and annual reporting

- Ensure all financial data is accurate and properly organized to support compliance across multiple jurisdictions

- Flag discrepancies or unusual transactions for review by the CFO



What We’re Looking For

- At least 5 years of experience in bookkeeping and expense reconciliation

- Strong proficiency in Xero

- Experience working with Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRMs

- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills

- Experience handling multi-entity, multi-currency financial data preferred

- Comfortable working in a remote-first environment

- Fluent in English, both written and spoken



Requirements for Effective Remote Work

- Reliable computer or laptop capable of photo and video editing

- Stable high-speed internet connection

- Conducive work environment



Working Schedule

- Full-time opportunity

- Remote work setup (Philippines-based applicants only)



Benefits

- Competitive pay

- Training and growth opportunities

- Opportunity to work with a fast-growing content-driven company



Salary range

- Php 40,000 - Php 65,000 (based on experience)



Application Instructions

Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here is what to do next:



Please go to the link below, review the questions carefully, and share the required information.





If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

title: AI Video Editor for Performance Ads (Part-Time)
description:
Are you a video editor who understands retention, AI tools, and what actually makes ads convert?



We’re a fast-growing e-commerce company launching multiple brands in the footwear and supplement space. We’re looking for a part-time Video Editor who combines creative instincts, marketing awareness, and AI-driven workflows to produce high-performing ads for Meta and YouTube.



This isn’t a task-based editing role. We’re looking for someone who can help shape the creative — sourcing assets, generating visuals with AI, and building ads designed to sell.



--



What You’ll Do



Create High-Retention Ads

Edit fast-paced short and long-form ads where the hook is critical and pacing keeps viewers engaged.



Generate AI Visuals

Use tools like Midjourney, Runway, Pika, or similar to create B-roll, characters, or scenes when footage doesn’t exist.



Source Smartly

Find strong visuals through stock libraries, social research, and competitor analysis.



Use AI for Script & Audio

Refine proven angles with AI tools and generate voiceovers using platforms like ElevenLabs.



Edit in CapCut

Work quickly using modern editing workflows, effects, and captions optimized for ad performance.



--



You’re a Strong Fit If

You use AI as part of your creative workflow

You understand the difference between aesthetic edits and ads that convert

You solve problems independently — if assets are missing, you create or source them



--



Offer



Part-time role (please specify your weekly availability when applying)

Compensation discussed based on experience



--



How to Apply

To confirm you’ve read this post, start your subject line with “RETENTION-FIRST” and answer the questions below:



1. Our goal is high retention. What specific technique do you use to keep viewers watching beyond the first 3 seconds?

2. Which generative AI tools do you currently use most, and what’s your process for creating a clip from scratch?

3. If we give you a script about hiking shoes but no footage, how would you build the video? Walk us through your sourcing approach.

4. Please share your portfolio with 2–3 ads you’ve created (ideally showing AI elements or strong pacing).

5. How many hours per week are you currently available?

title: HIRING NOW!! Frontend Grafana Dashboard Developer – Data Visualization – Fast Growing Marketing CANADIAN Company
description:
Hey there!

I'm looking for a HIGHLY TEACHABLE (Willing to Learn) junior to mid-level Grafana / Frontend Analytics Developer with excellent written English to build and refine client dashboards and analytics interfaces.



In the beginning, this is an on-call/part-time job, but it can grow into a full-time role where you'll handle more significant client dashboards if you prove to be a great fit.



Watch this video to learn more about how our agency works and to also see my personality and style:


/share/b301319feb524d55acb8eacb631cb7c1?sid=b843a7e2-95d
a0-51b42598f74f



---



ABOUT YOU:



• Great communicator in writing

• Detail-oriented and structured

• Extremely reliable

• Positive, no-excuse attitude

• Comfortable working within clearly defined task scopes

• Able to follow validation checklists

• Care about clean data presentation



---



IMPORTANT – SCREENING PROCESS:



Our hiring process includes two stages:



Stage 1 – Initial Technical Screening (Unpaid)

Selected applicants may be asked to complete a short, time-bounded screening exercise (approximately 15–20 minutes). This screening is designed to assess problem-solving approach and technical reasoning only. It does not require production-ready code, live system access, or work that will be used operationally. Submissions are used solely for evaluation.



Stage 2 – Final Technical Assessment (Paid)

Candidates who advance past Stage 1 may be invited to complete a structured, time-limited technical assessment using a controlled sample dataset created specifically for evaluation purposes. Final assessment submissions must include a Loom video walkthrough explaining the candidate’s approach, reasoning, and implementation decisions.



This stage:



• Is paid at a fixed rate upon written acceptance

• Requires submission of both the technical output and Loom video walkthrough

• Is clearly defined and time-bounded

• Is designed solely to evaluate technical ability

• Is not connected to live client systems or production work



---



KNOWLEDGE REQUIRED:



• Experience building dashboards in Grafana

• Strong understanding of panel configuration (tables, time series, bar charts, stat panels)

• Experience configuring dashboard variables and filters

• Ability to ensure filters affect all relevant panels correctly

• Strong attention to numeric formatting and data presentation

• Basic SQL understanding (ability to read and validate query output)

• Understanding of KPI logic (ROAS, conversion rate, AOV, etc.)



Bonus:



• Experience debugging conflicting filters

• Understanding of data validation workflows

• Experience working with PostgreSQL-backed dashboards

• Ability to identify and correct data inconsistencies



---



ABOUT ME (Alex):



• CEO with over 15 years of experience in digital marketing and analytics

• I move very fast and expect structured execution

• I reward performance and reliability

• I run the company remotely and am located in Indonesia



---



ABOUT THE POSITION:



We need a Grafana-focused developer who can:



• Build clean, structured dashboards

• Configure filters correctly

• Ensure numeric consistency across panels

• Validate presentation logic before submission

• Work inside defined task blocks with clear “done” states



You will not manage client strategy. You will focus on clean execution within a defined layer.

title: Lead Generation & Marketing Assistant — Remote | Long-Term
description:
Lead Generation & Marketing Assistant — Remote | Long-Term | Satou Agency



Location: Remote (Worldwide)

Schedule: Full-time

Salary: Competitive, based on experience + performance-based raises

Type: Long-term, stable position



About Us

Satou Agency is a fast-growing international PR & Digital Marketing agency helping exceptional professionals get noticed, trusted, and recognized worldwide. We work with clients across the USA, Europe, Asia, Africa, and CIS markets — specializing in strategic visibility, media placements, industry awards, and high-profile recognition opportunities.

We're a small, close-knit remote team — and we take hiring seriously. We're not looking for someone to fill a seat. We're looking for a person who is technically sharp, communicates with confidence, and wants to grow with us over the long term.



What This Role Is

This is a research, operations, and client communication role at the core of our business. You will build and maintain lead lists, manage CRM systems, support outreach campaigns, create materials, and communicate directly with international clients.

This role requires someone who can think analytically, handle structured data with precision, navigate multiple digital tools confidently, and write professional business English without hesitation. If you're organized, tech-savvy, and thrive in a clear system-driven environment — this role will suit you well.



What You'll Do Day-to-Day

Lead Generation & Outreach



Find and qualify leads on LinkedIn (advanced search) and other platforms

Research companies, decision-makers, and contact details

Build, structure, and maintain accurate contact databases



CRM &
 Automation



Manage and update CRM systems — primarily HubSpot and 

Create and maintain sales funnels and automation workflows

Build and execute targeted
 outreach campaigns, manage mailing lists



Data & Spreadsheet Management



Work with Google Sheets and Excel at a confident level — formulas, pivot tables, data structuring and cleanup

Keep all records organized, accurate, and up to date



Client Communication



Correspond with international clients via
 and messaging — professionally, clearly, and on time

Coordinate tasks and follow up internally to ensure nothing falls through the cracks



Presentations & Materials



Create polished presentations in Canva and PowerPoint for client pitches and internal use

Design basic marketing materials in Canva



AI & Tools



Use ChatGPT and other AI tools to streamline research, outreach, and daily workflows

Adapt quickly to new platforms and troubleshoot minor technical issues independently



Who We're Looking For

This role is best suited for someone with a technical or analytical background — IT, engineering, data, economics, or a related field — who has strong communication skills and is comfortable working in a fast-paced international environment.

Required:



Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, Engineering, Economics, or a related technical field (or equivalent hands-on experience)

Minimum 2 years of experience in a similar role — lead generation, marketing operations, digital assistant, or technical support

Advanced English — written and spoken. You will correspond with international clients. Grammar, tone, and clarity are non-negotiable.

Expert-level Google Sheets / Excel — formulas, pivot tables, data organization

Hands-on experience with HubSpot, 
, or similar CRM / outreach platforms

Proficiency in Canva and PowerPoint for presentation and materials creation

Strong LinkedIn search and lead generation skills

Detail-oriented, self-organized, and able to meet deadlines independently



Strong plus:



Experience with LinkedIn Sales Navigator or 

Background in B2B marketing, tech, or PR/communications

Experience working with US or European clients directly

Familiarity with Adobe Photoshop, CapCut, or Adobe Premiere Pro





What We Offer



100% remote — work from anywhere

Long-term, stable position with strong preference for internal growth

Direct exposure to international clients and global markets

Clear processes, no micromanagement

Performance-based salary increases

Real growth path: Lead Gen Specialist ? Marketing Ops ? Senior Assistant / Team Lead





How to Apply

Send us a short message that includes:



A brief overview of your background and relevant experience (3–5 sentences)

Your English level and any experience communicating with international clients

One example of a research, data, or lead generation task you've completed

Tools you've worked with (Google Sheets, HubSpot, LinkedIn, AI tools, etc.)



We read every application personally. Candidates who meet our criteria will be invited to a short Zoom interview.

title: Real Estate Transaction Coordinator Lead
description:
Position Summary



The Real Estate Transaction Coordinator Supervisor oversees the end-to-end transaction management process for a high-volume real estate team or brokerage. This role ensures that all contract-to-close activities are completed with excellence, compliance, and efficiency. The Supervisor trains, leads, and evaluates a team of Transaction Coordinators, implements best practices, maintains compliance standards, and works closely with agents, clients, lenders, title/escrow, and other stakeholders to deliver a world-class closing experience.



Key Responsibilities

Team Leadership & Management



Supervise, coach, and mentor a team of Transaction Coordinators, providing ongoing performance feedback and professional development.



Manage workload distribution and ensure proper staffing to meet volume demands.



Conduct regular tea
etings, training sessions, and 1:1s to review updates, challenges, compliance changes, and KPIs.



Train new hires on systems, checklists, CRM workflows, and brokerage policies.



Transaction Oversight



Monitor all real estate transactions from contract to close to ensure deadlines, contingencies, and compliance requirements are met.



Review purchase agreements, disclosures, amendments, and closing packages for accuracy and completeness.



Serve as the final escalation point for complex or high-risk transactions.



Ensure all parties are informed, supported, and updated throughout the process.



Compliance & Documentation



Maintain full compliance with brokerage, state, and MLS regulations.



Audit files before closing to ensure all documentation is properly stored and signed.



Communicate regularly with legal, broker-of-record, and compliance departments as needed.



Systems, Process & Improvement



Maintain and optimize transaction systems, CRM pipelines, checklists, and digital file infrastructures (Dotloop, Skyslope, Command, Follow Up Boss, etc.).



Implement process improvements to increase efficiency, accuracy, and client satisfaction.



Track and analyze transaction metrics (days to close, fallout rates, TC productivity, etc.) to inform leadership decisions.



Client & Partner Experience



Foster positive relationships with agents, clients, lenders, title/escrow, attorneys, and inspectors.



Resolve escalated client service issues with professionalism and urgency.



Ensure the transaction team provides timely, proactive communication and a consistent, polished experience.



Qualifications



3–5+ years real estate transaction management experience, preferably in a high-volume environment.



Prior leadership or supervisory experience strongly preferred.



Strong knowledge of real estate contracts, MLS rules, timelines, disclosures, and closing procedures.



Exceptional communication, time-management, and problem-solving skills.



Proficiency with real estate software (e.g., Skyslope, Dotloop, DocuSign, Brokermint, Command, Follow Up Boss, KVCore, Salesforce).



Ability to work in a deadline-driven, fast-paced environment with extreme attention to detail.



Key Competencies



Leadership & Team Development



Compliance & Risk Management



Organization & Multitasking



Client-First Mindset



Accountability & Ownership



Process Orientation



Professional Communication



Please let me know all the CRM's you may have worked with, all tech stacks, DOTLOOP, Skyslope, SISU, years of experience, etc....



Please replay with your favorite Animal so I know you read this entire job posting and have good attention to detail.



Thank you!

title: Funnel Builder
description:
About Us:

We are a fast-growing e-commerce company specializing in funnel-driven dropshipping, focused on building highly optimized, conversion-focused sales funnels at scale. Our success depends on operational excellence, strong testing systems, and skilled funnel builders who understand both the technical and strategic side of funnel performance. As part of our team, you will work alongside experienced funnel builders in a high-performance environment where results are recognized and rewarded.



Job Description:

We are looking for a Funnel Builder who will be responsible for building, maintaining, and optimizing high-converting funnels across our funnel ecosystem. In this role, you will not only execute funnel builds but also actively contribute insights, improvements, and strategic input based on performance data, product understanding, and conversion best practices. You will work in a fast-paced testing environment where precision, ownership, and performance-driven thinking are essential.



Responsibilities:



Funnel Creation & Implementation:

You will build and launch complete funnels based on internal SOPs, product requirements, and campaign strategies, ensuring technical accuracy and full functionality from start to finish.



Quality Control & Testing:

You will thoroughly test all funnels you build, ensuring that pages, links, integrations, checkout flows, and tracking systems work flawlessly.



Conversion-Focused Execution:

You will apply your understanding of copy structure, offer positioning, and funnel logic to ensure that each funnel is optimized for maximum conversion performance.



Product & Copy Understanding:

You will study the product, the offer, and the intended customer journey to ensure the funnel structure aligns with the marketing message and campaign goals.



Performance Contribution & Insights:

You will provide feedback, suggestions, and improvement ideas based on your experience, helping refine templates, layouts, and funnel systems over time.



Collaboration & SOP Compliance:

You will work closely with the store management and funnel teams, following internal SOPs while maintaining high professional standards and operational consistency.



Requirements:



Experience:

Proven experience building sales funnels (Funnelish, Shopify-based funnels, ClickFunnels, or similar platforms preferred).



Technical Accuracy & Attention to Detail:

Strong ability to ensure flawless technical setup, integrations, and user flow functionality.



Conversion Awareness:

Understanding of basic copy structure, conversion principles, and funnel psychology is required.



Ownership & Professionalism:

Highly professional, reliable, and capable of taking full ownership of the funnels you build.



Proactive & Insight-Driven:

Ability to think independently, provide improvement ideas, and contribute strategically rather than only executing instructions.



Language:

Fluent in English, both written and spoken.



What We Offer:



A high-performance remote working environment with a team of experienced funnel builders.

Competitive base compensation combined with a performance-based bonus system, where builders who consistently create winning funnels can earn substantial monthly bonuses.

The opportunity to significantly increase your earnings based on measurable performance and KPI achievement.

A collaborative environment where funnel builders continuously learn from each other and improve together.

Long-term growth opportunities within a rapidly scaling e-commerce organization.

title: Full-Time Social Media Ad Creative Designer (Facebook, Instagram & TikTok)
description:
We are a growing luxury perfume brand looking for a creative and reliable full-time Ad Creative Designer to join our team.



Your main role will be to create high-quality static image ads and simple animated video ads for
, Instagram, and TikTok. The video work involved does not include filming or voiceovers — only simple motion animations, text animations, product slides, and stylish transitions.



Responsibilities:



Create ad creatives in 1080x1080 (square) and 1080x1920 (vertical/story)



Design premium static image ads using product photos, lifestyle visuals, and text overlays



Create simple animated video ads ? for example:



Text reveal animations



Smooth zoom/pan effects



Slide transitions



Product highlight animations



Adapt creatives into multiple variations for A/B testing



Maintain a consistent luxury visual identity across all designs



Collaborate with our team for new creative concepts and improvements



Requirements:



Strong graphic design experience (Canva or Adobe Photoshop)



Experience with simple video animations (CapCut, Canva Animator, Premiere Pro, After Effects, or similar)



Good sense of typography, layout, color, and visual storytelling



Reliable, organized, and able to meet deadlines consistently

title: STR Virtual Assistant (Hospitable + PriceLabs) | Part-Time, ET Hours
description:
About the Role



I'm a US-based short-term rental operator with 5 active Airbnb listings across multiple markets (DC area and Florida). I've been managing my properties myself for 6 years and know the STR space well. I'm at a point where I'm looking to grow and need a strong operator in my corner to help run day-to-day operations at a high level.



I'm not looking for someone to train from scratch. I need someone who already knows the tools, STR platforms, and understands the STR world — and can keep up. This starts part-time (ET business hours coverage), with a clear path to full-time for the right person.



What You'll Be Working On



- Hospitable: day-to-day management, automation setup and optimization, connecting and managing 
 integration, setting up differentiated guest criteria (ID verification, insurance requirements) through the guest portal

- Other STR Platforms: I'm currently on Airbnb and VRBO plus a direct booking website. I want to expand to 
 and want support vetting my Furnished Finder MTR listings.

- PriceLabs: active revenue management across all 5 listings — not set-it-and-forget-it. I want someone monitoring pricing daily, adjusting for local events, seasonality, and demand shifts.

- Listing optimization: writing photo captions, competitive audits against top properties in each market, identifying gaps and implementing improvements.

- Guest communication: handling inquiries, booking management, modifications, cancellations, and issue resolution during ET business hours.

- General STR ops: cleaner coordination, maintenance follow-ups, reviews management.



Requirements (non-negotiable)



- Hands-on Hospitable experience — you need to know this platform well

- PriceLabs experience — active revenue management, not just basic setup

- Strong written English — you will be communicating directly with guests

- Experience managing STR properties specifically, not just LTR or MTR

- Available during US East Coast business hours



Nice to Have



- Experience with 
 channel management

- Familiarity with DC or Florida STR markets

- Prior experience at a major STR property management company (or former Airbnb/VRBO employee a plus)

- Experience with competitive listing audits



How to Apply



Please do not send a generic application. I will ignore it.



Instead, send a short written response answering these three questions:



1. Walk me through your Hospitable experience specifically. What have you set up, what automations have you built, and have you connected 
 through it?

2. How do you actively manage PriceLabs for a client? Walk me through what you look at and how often.

3. How many STR properties have you supported, and what markets were they in?



Bonus points if you can share a sample of work (listing copy, a pricing strategy you set up, etc.).

title: Architectural Draftsperson / Architect – Construction Drawings + 3D Render (Panel W System)
description:
Project Overview

I already have the complete architectural design and layout for my house.

I am not looking for design services.

I need a professional to translate my finalized design into a complete set of construction-ready working drawings, specifically prepared for building with Panel W (EPS structural panel system with concrete application) in Mexico.

The final drawing set must be ready for construction and suitable for review by a local structural engineer.



Scope of Work

Phase 1 – Construction Drawings (Priority)



Produce a complete architectural drawing set including:

- Dimensioned floor plans

- Exterior elevations

- Building sections

- Roof plan

- Foundation plan

- Wall sections detailing Panel W construction

- Door and window schedules

- Electrical layout

- Plumbing layout

- Basic structural details relevant to Panel W

- Construction details for panel connections, roof tie-ins, and slab interface



Deliverables:

- Editable source files (DWG / Revit)

- Full PDF construction set

- Drawings must clearly indicate:

- Wall thickness

- Concrete layers

- Reinforcement details

- Electrical conduit routing inside panels

- Plumbing planning prior to concrete application

- Phase 2 – 3D Modeling & Rendering

- 3D model of the house

- Realistic exterior renders

- Optional simple interior renders



Requirements

- Proven experience creating full construction drawing sets (not just 3D visuals)

- Strong knowledge of structural wall systems

- Experience with EPS / structural panel systems preferred

- Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, or similar professional drafting software

- Ability to work from sketches, inspiration images, and dimension notes



Please submit:

- Examples of previous construction drawing sets (PDFs preferred)

- Examples of 3D renders

- Confirmation of experience with structural panel systems (if applicable)



Important:

This is a technical drafting role, not a design concept role.

The design is complete. I need accurate, construction-ready documentation.



Please start your application with the word MIGRINO (so I know you've read the whole job post ;)

title: Technical Sales Associate
description:
We are looking for a Sales Associate who thrives at the intersection of hospitality and technology. You won't just be "selling"; you will be a consultant for hosts, helping them navigate the technical landscape of channel management, API integrations, and direct-booking strategies.



Key Responsibilities



Needs Analysis: Conduct deep-dive discovery calls with hosts to understand their current workflow, tools being used, pain points (e.g., double bookings, high commission fees), and growth goals in order to identify which Plan works best for each host.

Product Demonstrations: Lead engaging, technical walk-throughs of our platform and 6-minute onboarding flow. You must be able to explain how calendars sync across Airbnb and other channels,  how Google Vacation Rentals visibility drives traffic.

Sales Outreach: Proactively identify and engage with high-potential STR owners and property managers brought in through our Marketing funnels..

Technical Troubleshooting: Act as a bridge between the customer and our product team during onboarding, explaining technical features and ensuring the user understands the "how-to" of our direct-booking tools.

Pipeline Management: Manage the full sales cycle from initial contact to account setup and onboarding.



Candidate Requirements



Technical Aptitude: You are comfortable discussing the technology you will be trained on. This may include API connections, iCal synchronization, and web domain basics. You can learn software quickly and explain complex features in simple, relatable, plain-English terms.

Communication Excellence: You possess a clear, neutral professional accent and a high command of the English language. This is critical as you will be communicating with a diverse, global audience of property owners.

Proven Sales Track Record: 2+ years of experience in SaaS sales, ideally within PropTech, Travel, or Hospitality.

Consultative Approach: You are a listener first. You exude confidence and excel at asking the right questions to uncover a lead's true needs.

Self-Starter Mentality: You are comfortable with "the hunt." You have the discipline to manage your own outreach schedule and hit activity targets.

Technical:  Familiarity with CRM tools (Hubspot a plus) and GSuite 



Preferred Qualifications

Experience in the Short-Term Rental industry (as a host or in a similar software role).

Understanding of SEO, with a focus on creating websites. 

Bonus for being an STR owner or manager.

title: eCommerce Product Page & Checkout Developer (Replo preferred
description:
We are a performance marketing agency working primarily with supplement brands.



Our focus is simple: increase subscription revenue.



That means product pages, advertorials and checkouts need to convert cold paid traffic into long-term subscribers.



We work across different platforms depending on the client. Shopify is common, but not required. You must be comfortable adapting to whatever stack the client is using.



We often clone, duplicate and improve existing PDPs. We typically use Replo for this, but flexibility is important.



What You’ll Be Doing



• Cloning and rebuilding product pages

• Improving PDP structure based on CRO feedback

• Implementing subscription-first layouts

• Improving checkout UX

• Increasing AOV through bundles and offer structure

• Building advertorial to PDP journeys

• Making fast iteration updates based on our suggestions



We will send structured improvement suggestions. You will implement them quickly and accurately.



Tools We Commonly Use



• Replo (preferred)

• GemPages

• Native theme builders

• Subscription apps (Recharge, Skio, Appstle etc.)

• Whatever platform the client uses



What We’re Looking For



• Strong experience building high-converting PDPs

• Clear understanding of subscription positioning

• Experience working with paid traffic landing pages

• Ability to replicate winning layouts

• Fast turnaround

• Clean, mobile-first builds

• Portfolio with live links



Supplement or health brand experience is a bonus.



To Apply



Please send:



Links to product pages you’ve built



Examples of pages you have cloned or improved



Checkout optimisation examples



Your experience with Replo or similar tools



Your hourly rate



Your weekly availability

title: After-Hours Sales Specialist
description:
[PLEASE PROVIDE A LINK TO A BRIEF VOICE MEMO (E.G., VIA 
) DISCUSSING YOUR BACKGROUND WHEN APPLYING. APPLICATIONS WITHOUT AUDIO WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED.]



JOB SUMMARY:



Zippy Dumpster is expanding, and we are looking for a highly motivated, razor-sharp Sales & Operations Specialist to own our after-hours and weekend lead flow, as we generate a significant volume of high-intent leads during evenings and weekends.



Here is the best part: We do not require prior experience. We are hiring strictly for attitude, personality, and raw intelligence. If you are a naturally friendly, teachable person who learns quickly, we will train you on absolutely everything related to the job. Your immediate mission is speed to lead: responding to incoming inquiries instantly, building great rapport, and closing deals while our competitors are offline. As you master the inbound flow, this role will expand to include outbound lead generation—giving you direct control over your earning potential through our commission structure. Our business is nuanced, so you will also be fully trained in the operational side—from customer service, logistics, and billing to the specific service areas and nuances of dumpster sizes, weight limits, and prohibited materials.



WORKING HOURS & EXPECTATIONS:



Target Schedule: Specific weekdays from approximately mid-afternoon to late evening (LA/Pacific Time) and Weekends from approximately late morning to early evening (LA/Pacific Time). Exact hours will be finalized during the hiring process.



Pacing: While current lead volume during these hours is growing, we are prepared to significantly scale our marketing to keep you busy as you ramp up.



Responsiveness: Immediate response times to inbound leads are mandatory.



COMPENSATION & UPSIDE:



Base Salary: $5.00 USD per hour



Performance Bonuses: A generous commission and bonus structure will be implemented based on sales and lead conversions. While we are currently focused on inbound leads, we will be incorporating outbound lead generation into this role, making this position highly lucrative for a top performer with the drive to close.



JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:



Rapid Lead Conversion: Act as the first point of contact for after-hours and weekend leads. Respond immediately, provide accurate quotes, and convert inquiries into scheduled deliveries.



Follow-Up: Follow up with potential customers, and build a pipeline to ensure maximum conversion rates.



Master Operations: Learn and execute all operational duties alongside sales, including scheduling, customer service, billing, and coordinating with our drivers.



Retain Complex Knowledge: Understand and clearly communicate the complicated nuances of our services, including the specifics of various dumpster sizes and what materials are allowed or prohibited.



JOB REQUIREMENTS:



Experience: None required. We are looking for the right person, not the right resume.



Attitude & Personality: You must have a fantastic, upbeat personality, a great attitude, and be highly coachable. You are the voice of our company.



Cognitive Ability: You must be highly intelligent, adaptable, and a phenomenally quick learner.



Language: Exceptional (Native or C1/C2 level) verbal and written English fluency is mandatory.



OUR INTERVIEW PROCESS

We are looking for someone sharp, and our interview process reflects that. To ensure a mutual fit, our process includes:



The "Meet & Greet" (Social Interview): A brief, conversational interview to get to know you, assess your English fluency, and ensure your personality is a great fit for our team.



The "Deep Dive" (Technical Interview): A rigorous 45 min session where we will teach you some nuances of our business, including dumpster sizing and operational rules.



The Knowledge Test: At the end of the Deep Dive, you will be tested on the information we just taught you to see how quickly and accurately you absorb complex details.

title: Executive Assistant (Operations, Marketing & Growth Support)
description:
Role: Executive Assistant (High Ownership, Results-Only)



I’m a growth partner for online businesses doing 6+ figures/month. I’m looking for an Executive Assistant who can handle the daily operations of my business and personal life.



The Reality: I don’t have time to manage you. If I have to chase you for an update, explain a task twice, or worry about whether you’re actually working during your shift, you aren’t the right fit. I need someone who acts like a business owner—someone who solves problems, anticipates what I need next, and takes total ownership of their tasks.



Compensation: $1,500/month base, with the ability to scale to $2,000/month for someone who consistently takes initiative, and saves me more time than they cost.



What You Must Do:

- Be available and responsive: During EST core hours (10am–8pm). If you aren’t available, don't apply.

- Use tracking tools: We use Apploye. You log in, you log out, you stay accurate. If you view time tracking as "micromanagement," you won’t survive here.

- Own the task: I give you a priority—you get it done. If you hit a wall, you figure out the solution. If you need help, you ask after you’ve tried to solve it yourself.



Essentially, you manage the details so I can focus on growth. You don't wait for me to ask you to do something, you're proactive and do it yourself. 



Requirements:

- This role is specifically for a female EA.

- You are hyper-organized and tech-savvy (AI, Meta Ads, GoHighLevel, Airtable).

- You communicate clearly, concisely, and immediately.



What You’ll Be Responsible For



You’ll help run both my business and personal operations, including but not limited to:



Operations & Admin

- Managing my calendar, scheduling/rescheduling meetings

- Keeping me organized and on top of priorities

- Handling personal tasks when needed (travel planning, logistics, etc.)



Marketing & Client Support

- Scheduling
s and social media posts

- Assisting with funnel building (GoHighLevel, landing pages, automations)

- Building ad campaigns from detailed briefs (Meta Ads)

- Writing or improving copy (using AI when appropriate)

- Setting up ad accounts, campaigns, and retargeting flows



Finance & Tracking

- Tracking client payments, team payouts, and commissions

- Updating Airtable/Google Sheets with accurate numbers ASAP

- Creating simple weekly reports (cash collected, payouts, etc.)



Growth Support

- Helping find new clients (DMs,
 outreach, research)

- Supporting client work with my partners

- Uploading data, sales calls, and notes into AI systems for insights



The Application Process (Read Carefully):

Do not send me a generic resume. To apply, you must send a video or write a short paragraph explaining:



1. Why you are the perfect fit for this role compared to everyone else.

2. An example of a time you took ownership of a task so well that your boss didn't have to think about it again.



If you don't include this, I won't read your application.

title: USPTO Trademark Research & Filing Specialist
description:
We are seeking an experienced Trademark Research & Filing Specialist to help us research and file approximately 40 U.S. trademark applications over an 8-12 week period.



This is a project-based contract role with clear deliverables and timelines. You will work directly with a U.S.-based founder and leadership team.



We are looking for someone who has real hands-on experience inside the USPTO system — not just theoretical knowledge.



If you’ve prepared TEAS applications, conducted clearance searches, selected proper classes, and handled Office Actions before — this is for you.



Project Scope

- Research approximately 40 brand names, phrases, and marks.

- Conduct comprehensive clearance searches (TESS + common law review).

- Assess potential conflicts and provide risk summaries.

- Recommend appropriate International Classes.

- Prepare and file applications via USPTO TEAS.

- Track deadlines and maintain an organized filing log.

- Assist with non-substantive USPTO correspondence if needed.

- Coordinate status updates weekly.



We want clean, accurate filings. No shortcuts. No guessing on classes.



What We’re Looking For

- 3+ years hands-on experience with U.S. trademark filings.

- Direct experience using USPTO TEAS and TESS systems.

- Strong understanding of International Classes and identification of goods/services.

- Experience preparing Office Action responses (non-substantive required; substantive a plus).

- Excellent written English.

- Extremely detail-oriented.

- Organized and deadline-driven.

- Paralegal or IP law background preferred, but not required if experience is strong.



Timeline & Expectations

- Project length: 8-12 weeks.

- Approximately 5–6 applications researched and prepared per week.

- Clear weekly reporting.

- Flexible schedule, but must overlap at least 2–3 hours with U.S. EST time.



Compensation

- Project-based compensation. Please include your rate per application or weekly rate in your application.



How to Apply

Step 1: In 2–3 paragraphs, describe your direct USPTO trademark experience. Be specific.

Step 2: Tell us how many applications you have personally filed.

Step 3: Describe one Office Action you handled and how you resolved it.

Step 4: Use the subject line: “Trademark Precision.”

Step 5: When applying, include the number 40 in your message so we know you read this fully.



We are ready to begin immediately.



Please apply only through OnlineJobs.ph. Do not contact outside the platform.
